mapper.insert: insert into course(courseName, courseclass, term, teacherName, joinable, isschoolclass, courseschool, coursemajor, learningrequire, teachprogess, examarrange, image, coursestate) values (#{courseName},#{courseclass},#{term},#{teacherName},#{joinable},#{isschoolclass},#{courseschool},#{coursemajor},#{learningrequire},#{teachprogess},#{examarrange},#{image},#{coursestate})
mapper.select: select count(*) from course where courseId = #{courseId}
